lineage.Process: Merge I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp;I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp I:\city_pt\gnis_azcities.shp "FNAME FNAME true false false 64 Text 0 0 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,FNAME,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,FNAME,-1,-1;COUNTY COUNTY true false false 12 Text 0 0 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,COUNTY,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,COUNTY,-1,-1;LAT_DD LAT_DD true false false 19 Double 5 18 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,LAT_DD,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,LAT_DD,-1,-1;LON_DD LON_DD true false false 19 Double 5 18 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,LON_DD,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,LON_DD,-1,-1;ELEVATION ELEVATION true false false 5 Long 0 5 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,ELEVATION,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,ELEVATION,-1,-1;EST_POP EST_POP true false false 7 Long 0 7 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,EST_POP,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,EST_POP,-1,-1;FED_STATUS FED_STATUS true false false 23 Text 0 0 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,FED_STATUS,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,FED_STATUS,-1,-1;CELL_NAME CELL_NAME true false false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,CELL_NAME,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,CELL_NAME,-1,-1;INCORPORAT INCORPORAT true false false 1 Text 0 0 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,INCORPORAT,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,INCORPORAT,-1,-1;POP2000 POP2000 true false false 19 Double 11 18 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,POP2000,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,POP2000,-1,-1;DEF_CAT DEF_CAT true false false 20 Text 0 0 ,First,#,I:\city_pt\gnisother.shp,DEF_CAT,-1,-1,I:\city_pt\gniscdp_all.shp,DEF_CAT,-1,-1"

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3500

descript.abstract:
This dataset represents point locations of cities and towns in Arizona. The data contains point locations for incorporated cities, Census Designated Places and populated places. Several data sets were used as inputs to construct this data set. A subset of the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) national dataset for the state of Arizona was used for the base location of most of the points. Polygon files of the Census Designated Places (CDP), from the U.S. Census Bureau and an incorporated city boundary database developed and maintained by the Arizona State Land Department were also used for reference during development. Every incorporated city is represented by a point, originally derived from GNIS. Some of these points were moved based on local knowledge of the GIS Analyst constructing the data set. Some of the CDP points were also moved and while most CDP's of the Census Bureau have one point location in this data set, some inconsistencies were allowed in order to facilitate the use of the data for mapping purposes. Population estimates were derived from data collected during the 2010 Census.
During development, an additional attribute field was added to provide additional functionality to the users of this data. This field, named 'DEF_CAT', implies definition category, and will allow users to easily view, and create custom layers or datasets from this file. For example, new layers may created to include only incorporated cities (DEF_CAT = Incorporated), Census designated places (DEF_CAT = Incorporated OR DEF_CAT = CDP), or all cities that are neither CDP's or incorporated (DEF_CAT= Other).
This data is current as of February 2012. At this time, there is no planned maintenance or update process for this dataset.
descript.purpose: This data is created to serve as base information for use in GIS systems for a variety of planning, reference, and analysis purposes. This data does not represent a legal record.

idinfo.accconst: Access is granted to public agencies, educational institutions, non-profit organizations and private individuals for non-commercial purpose. For commercial use of the data see Arizona Revised Statutes 39-121.03
idinfo.useconst: The Arizona State Land Department makes no warranties, implied or expressed, with respect to the accuracy of and the use of this data for any specific purpose. Users are required to make their own assessment of the data for any specific use.

srcinfo.srccontr: Source provided digital point locations of Arizona cities

procstep.procdesc: A reprojection of data to NAD_1983_HARN_UTM_Zone_12N

Subset was created by selecting all populated place locations for the state of Arizona from the GNIS national data set. Populated places falling within incorporated city boundaries that were not associated to said incorporated city were eliminated unless said point was of historical value. The following points were moved from their original location. The reasoning for each change in location is listed after each point name.
Alamo Lake - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Anthem - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Avondale - point moved to government address using 2005 aerial Bagdad - point moved to city center on DOQQ Beaver Dam - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Beaver Valley - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Carmen - part of one CDP: Tumacacori - Carmen CDP Centennial Park - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Central Heights-Midland City - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Cienega Springs - changed categorization to CDP; point fell inside Parker Strip CDP & no other GNIS was point available Citrus Park - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Clacks Canyon - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Corona de Tucson - point moved to city center on 24KDRG Deer Creek - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Drexel-Alvernon - no GNIS point for CDP - no population on DOQQ Dudleyville - point moved to city center on 24KDRG East Fork - point moved inside CDP polygon & city center on DOQQ East Globe - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial East Verde Estates - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Elephant Head - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial El Prado Estates - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Ehrenberg - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Flowing Springs - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Fort Valley - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Freedom Acres - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Geronimo Estates - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Gold Camp - point deleted - no indication of population; called Gold Canyon by locals Gold Canyon - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Goodyear - point moved to government address using 2005 aerial Goodyear Village - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Grand Canyon West - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Haigler Creek - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Hard Rock - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Hondah - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Hunter Creek - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Icehouse Canyon - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial La Paz Valley - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Lechee Chapter - changed name to Lechee & categorization to CDP Marana - point moved to government address using 2004 aerial Martinez Lake - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Mead Ranch - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial New Kingman-Butler - no GNIS point for CDP - no population on DOQQ Oljato-Monument Valley - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Parker - no GNIS point for CDP - no population on DOQQ Parker Strip - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Peeples Valley - point moved inside CDP polygon Pine Lake - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Pinion Pines - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Pinetop Country Club - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Rainbow City - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Red Rock - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Rock House - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Rincon Valley - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Rio Rico - one point for four CDPs: Rio Rico NE, NW, SE, SW Rough Rock - CDP called Round Rock; changed categorization to CDP Round Valley - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Sacate Village - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Saddlebrooke - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Sahuarita - point moved inside CDP polygon & city center on DOQQ Saint Michaels - point moved inside CDP polygon & city center on DOQQ Santan - changed categorization to Other; point not located inside CDP polygon & no indication of population San Tan Valley - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Scenic- point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Scottsdale - point moved to historic downtown using 2005 aerial Six Shooter Canyon - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Stotonic - changed categorization to CDP; point fell inside Santan CDP & point matched population on DOQQ Stotonic Village - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Sunwest - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Tempe - point moved to historic downtown using 2005 aerial Tortolilita - point moved to city center on 24KDRG Tsaile - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Tumacacori - part of one CDP: Tumacacori - Carmen CDP Valencia West - no GNIS point for CDP - no population on DOQQ Verde - point moved outside of Cottonwood incorporated boundary Wellton Hills - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial Whetstone - point moved inside CDP polygon White Cone - point moved to populated area using NAIP 2010 aerial
A join of tables was performed based on name with ASLD's current cities polygon file to retain census population information.
An additional field was added to denote categorization as incorpated city, census designated place or other.

srcinfo.srccontr: Population Estimates for Incorporated Cities & Towns, CDP's and Other Places derived from the U.S. Census (2010).

procstep.procdesc: Population estimates updated using figures derived from the 2010 Census.

attracc.attraccr: Accurate according to GNIS federal standards
